subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham celebrated his Paris St.-Germain debut by helping to create the second goal to beat Marseille. In other action, Manchester City beat Chelsea and A.C. Milan and Inter tie.
snippet: David Beckham celebrated his Paris St.-Germain debut by helping to create the second goal to beat Marseille. In other action, Manchester City beat Chelsea and A.C. Milan and Inter tie.
